typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Version_Name as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Budget_Type as string,
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
StagingDB derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
AddAuditColumns select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Version_Name,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCoulmnOutput
